## HashMap.set() method

Sets the value for the key in the hash map. Returns the hash map.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(key: K, value: V): HashMap<K, V>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | K | The key of the element to add to the hash map. |
|  value | V | The value of the element to add to the hash map. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[HashMap](./calcium.hashmap.md)<!-- -->&lt;K, V&gt;
